meta_description: The Asian Art Museum of San Francisco houses one of the most comprehensive Asian art collections in the world.
hours_text:
###  Hours 

Thu: 

10 AM–5 PM* 

Fri–Mon: 

10 AM–5 PM 

Tue–Wed: 

Closed 

**THURSDAY NIGHTS**

In December, the museum is open 10am-5pm on Thursdays. Thursday night programming resumes in January. 

* * *

The Asian Art Museum is closed on Jan. 1, Thanksgiving Day, and Dec. 25. 

Our museum store, the [Cha May Ching Museum Boutique](http://web.archive.org/web/20251129072503/https://about.asianart.org/museum-boutique/), is open during regular museum hours and does not require paid admission.

[Our restaurant, Asian Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20251129072503/https://about.asianart.org/dining/), is open during regular museum hours and does not require paid admission. On Thursdays Asian Box opens at 12 PM, an hour before our galleries open. 

[BUY TICKETS](http://web.archive.org/web/20251129072503/https://asianart.org/reserve-tickets "a.button.buttton--cta.button--gold.button--outline")

#  Accessibility 

We strive to make the Asian Art Museum accessible and welcoming to all.
